attributes.action: For Wales to hold a national referendum to seek independence from Britain.
attributes.additional_details:
For a number of years we have seen the current U.K government destroy families with poor and unlawful immigration restrictions, social cuts and the cost of living has become so disgraceful that foodbanks are used in 2017! 2017. 
For every proud Welsh man and Woman now is the time to finally escape this tyranny, because this is what it is. Scotland has the right to vote, now lets make our voices heard. No longer will we accept our healthcare being sold to the highest bidder, lets be free!
attributes.background: For Wales to be free from the unfair rulings of Westminster and to seek independence. For Wales to seek freedom. For every Welsh man and Welsh woman to have the freedom to vote and make their voices heard. That we are Welsh. We are able to stand alone. We want Freedom!
